subtitleNullable: This dataset can be used to have sentimental analysis on recent environment news
descriptionNullable:
### Context and Inspiration

Due to the global pandemic situation, various lockdowns have been imposed in different countries, This data contains short snippets of news from 2017 to Jan 2020. this can be useful to perform sentimental analysis on news and have a general idea about what were the sentiments of the people before the pandemic situation. What was going on in the news, then we can do a comparative study of before and after the pandemic news.

Different news sources are present in this dataset

### Data Dictionary

| Feature Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
|  URL| Link to the news archive |
| MatchDateTime | Date and time of airing |
|Station  | News Station |
|Show| Name of the show aired on| 
|IAShowID| Custom Show ID in archive |
|IAPreviewThumb| Link to the thumbnail image|
|Snippet| Actual snippet of news published and aired|
title: Environmental News NLP Dataset
subtitle: This dataset can be used to have sentimental analysis on recent environment news
description:
### Context and Inspiration

Due to the global pandemic situation, various lockdowns have been imposed in different countries, This data contains short snippets of news from 2017 to Jan 2020. this can be useful to perform sentimental analysis on news and have a general idea about what were the sentiments of the people before the pandemic situation. What was going on in the news, then we can do a comparative study of before and after the pandemic news.

Different news sources are present in this dataset

### Data Dictionary

| Feature Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
|  URL| Link to the news archive |
| MatchDateTime | Date and time of airing |
|Station  | News Station |
|Show| Name of the show aired on| 
|IAShowID| Custom Show ID in archive |
|IAPreviewThumb| Link to the thumbnail image|
|Snippet| Actual snippet of news published and aired|
